sentences.en: Advantageously, it can also be used as access ramp to the bearing railway structure.
sentences.cn: 有利地, 它还可用作进入铁路运载结构的斜坡.

sentences.en: In other embodiments, combinations or sub - combinations of the above disclosed invention can be advantageously made.
sentences.cn: 在其它实施例中, 可有利地作出以上所公开的发明的组合或子组合.

sentences.en: In this way he implies that'true'communities exist which can be advantageously juxtaposed to nations.
sentences.cn: 以此方式,盖尔纳暗示 ‘ 真实 ’ 共同体存在,并且其地位比民族优越.

sentences.en: It is highly advantageous to us.
sentences.cn: 这对我们极为有利. advantageously

sentences.en: Kindly oblige us by realizing same as advantageously as possible.
sentences.cn: 请以尽可能有利的价格出售,我们深表谢意.

sentences.en: New York city is advantageously situated on the bank of the Husdon River.
sentences.cn: 纽约市濒临哈德逊河两岸,地势优越.

sentences.en: Such a conclusion may be advantageously used in guiding the design of the turbine control system.
sentences.cn: 所得结论对调节系统设计具有指导意义.

sentences.en: The children were advantageously in Seattle.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在西雅图安顿很很好.

sentences.en: The children were settled advantageously in Seattle.
sentences.cn: 孩子们被安顿在西雅图,这对他们的成长非常有利.

sentences.en: The Ge - depleted liquid phase is advantageously returned to the GeCl 4 converting process.
sentences.cn: 有利地,将Ge贫乏的液相返回到GeCl4转化工艺.

sentences.en: To show off becomingly or advantageously.
Will China's financial institutions position themselves advantageously against international competitors after China's entry into the WTO?
sentences.cn: 中国加入WTO以后,在不同的经营体制下,中国金融机构与国际金融机构竞争时是否处于有利地位?

words.tran_cn: 得天独厚的；有利的；占有利位置的
